website_summaries.verdict: This curved sectional is a stylish option for outdoor living, and considering all it has to offer, the price may surprise you.
pros: A beautiful outdoor sectional for a decent price
Features attractive wicker over a steel frame
Five-piece set includes a glass-top table that adds to its value
cons: Size is on the small side, but this isn't a deal breaker and may be more practical for limited spaces

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all fade resistant. Within a week it started to fade now it's just a flushed blue purpleish color. Update! After writing this review customer service immediately contacted me and sent new covers with a upgraded fabric so far they look great! Couldn't ask for better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 sets, wish we could have only purchased 2 extra middle seats but turns out glad we have 2 full sets. The sets were ordered about 2 months apart. Assembly took maybe an hour each set. Only had an issue with one bolt, but I was using an electric impact gun, so my fault. (Think cordless drill with extra umph.) I emailed customer service prior to ordering second set to see if could order just 2 of the seats, they responded quickly. I would order again as of right now.
customer_reviews.author: Earl S. Rider Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Back cushions faded badly after only one month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a Mother's Day present for my wife, After receiving and assembly, she loved it,. After 1 month the back cushions have all faded badly, the bottom cushions have not faded, so the set now looks mis-matched. Based upon the cost of the set, I would have expected much higher quality from Solaura and Amazon
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, so get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall ok product, but not a sturdy product compared to other more expensive wicker furniture I have owned. Will not support much more than 200lbs, as product advertises. Difficult and frustrating to put together as bolts and holes do not line up well or at all. And you have to use ratchet tool they supply for weird bolts they supply. Lower to the ground than expected. Good for maybe a couple of years, if covered.
customer_reviews.author: Altrit

customer_reviews.title: Can not get replacement cushions!! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: This is an overall decent set. Not very easy to put together, but doesn't take too long. Try and keep it nice, because one of my cushions was damaged and they said it can't be replaced because they don't use the manufacturer that made my particular couch even though it was only 11 months since I had purchased it. I would not recommend this set based on that because now I have to buy a new couch.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara C. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality furniture
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is perfect for our patio. It’s sturdy, the colors are perfect, and it’s a good size. We cover it up when we’re not using it to prevent any fading of the pillows. We’ve had it for a couple of weeks now and so far no fading. We also bought furniture spray that supposedly helps with fading. It took my spouse and I about 3 hours to assemble. Overall this sectional is 5/5, great value, and works perfect for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This couch is very overpriced. First off the listing said “real wood” finish. It’s not, the arms of the couch are veneer but look very plastic and feel cheap. Secondly, the size of the vouch is very low. It looks like a kids couch because of its odd size. See image below. My chaise lounge chair is massive compared to this entire couch. I do like the table and think it has a nice modern look to it. But the couch is not my favorite and feels cheap due to its odd size.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Geldner

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: We really like this set and it works nicely on our back patio. So far, it seems very durable and weather resistant. It is a little smaller than we had expected but it's comfortable and easy to assemble. Overall very happy with our purchase! Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan kindred

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware :(
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited when we bought this. It was so perfect for the space around our firepit. I bought this in March, and now by September it has COMPLETELY faded from navy to grey. Looks awful. Shouldn't have faded like this after only 6 months. And the worst part, is that I bought the cover! Even with covering it for periods it fades badly. Other than that it is a good seating area.
customer_reviews.author: Janalynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice furniture
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up well after 1.5 years in AZ desert. I still keep cushions stored and use an outdoor cover to prevent any fading when not in use. Broke a clip when moving furniture to another location and Solaura sent me a link to purchase additional clips
customer_reviews.author: KC Klein

customer_reviews.title: Circle Of Dreams
customer_reviews.text: I have already gotten so many compliments on this couch. It is so amazing and nothing on the market compares. The price is super reasonable and the quality is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These we harder to put together than I thought. The cushions are not really waterproof at all! They get soaked with water when it rains and take forever to dry up. The plastic pieces that hold the section together broke so now I can’t keep them from sliding and moving when people sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: nour couture

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase This Couch
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this couch. It is not worth the money. It is flimsy. Assembly is a nightmare with screw holes not lined up. And the picture in the ad is enlarged to make it look bigger than it is. Carefully check the dimensions listed and measure area you are using for. Most likely this couch will not meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K.

customer_reviews.title: Product was nice if we would have received all of it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the chairs unfortunately the couch was lost in delivery twice so we had to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Patio furniture looks nice on our back deck. Assembly was easy. We had an issue with 2 back pieces sent in one of the boxes (wrong sections sent). However, the customer service department was quick to respond and they sent us another box with the correct sections within a week.
customer_reviews.author: CALALUM

customer_reviews.title: It takes a little time to assemble, but love it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice, looks good and is sturdy,
customer_reviews.author: susan brown

customer_reviews.title: 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: Great product love the color of the covers and very sturdy and great quality for the price highly recommends easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Artworks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in my space
customer_reviews.text: I love this furniture. The only drawback is if you sit too long, you leave an imprint in the cushions. But it is comfortable nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Bluextreme1920

customer_reviews.title: Color beautiful comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful made strong fits perfect if you want something small not to big but very very roomy fit
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad J.

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling material. Easy clean.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pillows that fit right on the backs of each section. Love the color, very comfy. Great look for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hochhalter

customer_reviews.title: Almost impossible to get replacement parts!
customer_reviews.text: Cushions are not that durable! I had a back and bottom cushion come apart at the seam within weeks! Now I am out a set of cushions, can’t find replacement covers anywhere! Not to happy considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These began to fall apart the 2nd summer. The tops completely rotted apart and are not repairable. Too much money for such a small life expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new couch! Took about 3 hours to put together by myself. Only 4 stars because I feel the base/weave color is a little too brown, not light grey as described. It’s only been 1 day but we’re pretty happy!
customer_reviews.author: Brucefanmom

customer_reviews.title: I took my time assembling and I did it myself
customer_reviews.text: We use the set to surround our gas fire pit. It is beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic and is great with weather changes. But the clips brok on the first day in one section wish they were a bit more reliable
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for intimate conversation!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We purchased two sets for our Gazebo and find that for for money, they are an excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: gayle montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something more stylish on our pool deck and this sofa is perfect
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn P

customer_reviews.title: Value & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick and easy. Great value for the money. Looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and the cushions are soft and plush. Fits perfectly around our outdoor fire place.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not great. Invisible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: - Cushions fade VERY quickly. Have had it for less than a year and my navy cushions are faded purple. - Section clips and extremely difficult to install, do not hold and will break on you. - I can't find this manufacturer anywhere on the net. I went to their seller's page on Amazon and no customer service number was listed which is poor customer service. I emailed them, they emailed me back with a less than helpful reply and will only interact with me through Amazon email.
customer_reviews.author: US Customer

customer_reviews.title: cushions don’t hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Love the set!! Cushions just aren’t very thick and aren’t wearing real well. The back cushions need more filler to not sag. I cannot find any replacement cushions anywhere. Fabric isn’t as sturdy as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Plumlee

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience. Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: POOOOOR QUALITY. Awful experience from the beginning. Pieces were shipped incorrectly, twice. The cushions faded after 2 months. In less than 2 years, the set is very lightly used and literally falling apart. It looks terrible and now we have to completely replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushions are completely faded
customer_reviews.text: Not really water resistant or fade resistant. Our cushions are completely faded and we store them away in a storage container. Doesn’t help when it’s impossible to find replacement cushions as well. Cushions have gone from navy blue to a faded purple.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew I.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad looking! Putting it together was a little bit of a pain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is quite easy and uncomplicated. I am really happy with the quality. It's a great product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Oleksy

product_meta.title: SOLAURA Outdoor 5-Piece Sectional Furniture Patio Half-Moon Set Brown Wicker Sofa Beige Cushions & Sophisticated Glass Coffee Table
product_meta.description:
Color:Brown

About the SOLAURA

SOLAURA provide high-quality, long-lasting patio furniture at affordable prices you cannot find in stores. Our all-weather synthetic wicker is hand woven in complex constructions that adds both durability and style to each set with durable fabrics. Further, our premium fabric selections used in every set offer comfort. SOLAURA offers a variety of timeless color combinations that were carefully selected to match your home’s unique style. Whether it is a warm grey, navy blue, or classic brown or black configuration that suits you; the SOLAURA is sure to have something that will help transform your outdoor living space to an outdoor oasis.

Upgrade Your Outdoor Living 

Whether you are entertaining guests or simply enjoying alone time with you and your family, you'll want a furniture set that can offer both style and comfort. Something that looks great and feels great. That’s why we created this unforgettably gorgeous and comfortable SOLAURA Outdoor 5 Piece Wicker Sectional Sofa Set that comes with an elegant tempered glass-top table. 

Product Details:

 * Half Moon Crescent Sectional Set with Glass-Top Coffee Table
 * (1) Left Chair Section , (1) Right Chair Section , (2) Middle Seat , (1) Coffee Table 
 * Weight capacity: 250lbs/seat 
 * Outdoor Water Resistant Seat Cushions 
 * Stylish Durable, Comfortable 
 * Easy to Manage, Clean and Maneuver 
 * Size Details(Check Dimensions in Photographs 3) 
 * US Based Brand 

You will never have a problem getting in touch with a customer service rep.  

PLEASE NOTE:

 

Our digital images are as accurate as possible. However, different monitors may cause colors to vary slightly. Allow reasonable errors. Thanks for your understanding!
feature_bullets: 【Timeless & Intimate Design】 This hand-woven weathered rich brown wicker outdoor crescent sectional with classic beige pillows fits a variety of living space styles and settings. This is the perfect outdoor sofa if you have an outdoor space, you can still enjoy a cup of coffee under the sun, or have a few drinks with friends!

【Comfortable and Functional】 This outdoor sofa set comes with sponge padded seat cush and back cushions that encourages restful lounging. It's modular and versatile design allows it to be rearranged into different configurations for your occasion.

【All-Weather Synthetic Wicker】 Engineered all-weather synthetic natural brown wicker to mimic the variegated look and feel of natural wicker. Carefully designed complex weave patterns for added strength and durability. Imitation wood material of the armrest mimics solid wood.The rich color provides a premium outdoor look.

【Premium Olefin Fabric】 Featuring durable beige olefin outdoor fabric that is strong and easy to clean. At the same time, the fabric texture remains soft to the hand & cushion covers remove with a quick zip!
【Efficient Assembly】 Minimal assembly (2 persons, 90-150 minutes). All necessary hardware and instructions included. Feel free to let us help anytime during the assembly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
